mapper.select: /* 로그인된 챌린지 멤버 아이디 */ SELECT cg_num FROM challenge_member_feed WHERE mbr_id = #{memberId} LIMIT 1

/* 챌린지 피드 리스트 */ SELECT cmf.cmf_num, cmf.cg_num, cmf.mbr_id, cmf.cmf_content, cmf.cmf_date, cmf.cmf_like, cmf.cmf_warning_check, cmf.cmf_file_idx, cmf.cmf_food_intake, cmf.mc_num, m.mbr_file_idx, f.file_path AS mbr_profile_img, ff.file_path AS cmf_feed_img FROM challenge_member_feed cmf INNER JOIN `member` m ON cmf.mbr_id = m.mbr_id INNER JOIN files f ON m.mbr_file_idx = f.file_idx INNER JOIN files ff ON cmf.cmf_file_idx = ff.file_idx

/* 챌린지 피드 리스트(페이징 처리) */ SELECT cmf.cmf_num, cmf.cg_num, cmf.mbr_id, cmf.cmf_content, cmf.cmf_date, cmf.cmf_like, cmf.cmf_warning_check, cmf.cmf_file_idx, cmf.cmf_food_intake, cmf.mc_num, m.mbr_file_idx, f.file_path AS mbr_profile_img, ff.file_path AS cmf_feed_img FROM challenge_member_feed cmf INNER JOIN `member` m ON cmf.mbr_id = m.mbr_id INNER JOIN files f ON m.mbr_file_idx = f.file_idx INNER JOIN files ff ON cmf.cmf_file_idx = ff.file_idx WHERE cmf.cg_num = #{challengeCode} ORDER BY cmf.cmf_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.rowPerPage}

/* 현재 참여중인 챌린지 리스트 조회 */ SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.mbr_id, cg.cg_name, f.file_path, cg.cg_content, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, stl.ctl_level, ct.ct_num, ct.ct_name, cs.cs_num, cs.cs_status FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level stl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_status cs USING(cs_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) INNER JOIN files f ON cg.cg_file_idx = f.file_idx INNER JOIN challenge_group_member cgm ON cg.cg_num = cgm.cg_num WHERE cgm.mbr_id = #{memberId} AND cs.cs_num NOT IN ('cs_007', 'cs_008') ORDER BY cg_start_date DESC

/* 특정 챌린지 피드 조회 */ SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.cg_name, cg.mbr_id, ct.ct_name, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, ctl.ctl_level, ctl.ctl_content, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, cg.cg_content, f.file_path FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level ctl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) INNER JOIN challenge_member_feed cmf USING(cg_num) INNER JOIN files f ON cg.cg_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cg.cg_num = #{challengeCode} AND cg.cg_num IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.rowPerPage}

/* 챌린지 피드 수정 화면 조회 */ SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.cg_name, cg.mbr_id, ct.ct_name, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, ctl.ctl_level, ctl.ctl_content, cg.cg_max_mbr_count, cg.cg_content, f.file_path FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level ctl USING(ctl_num) INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct USING(ct_num) INNER JOIN challenge_member_feed cmf USING(cg_num) INNER JOIN files f ON cg.cg_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cg.cg_num = #{challengeCode} AND cg.cg_num IS NOT NULL
/* 챌린지 피드 행 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_member_feed cmf WHERE cmf.cg_num = #{challengeCode} AND cg_num IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cmf_date DESC

/* 총 업로드 데이터 합계(그래프/챌린지 정보) */ SELECT cg.cg_num, mcsl.mcsl_num, mcsl.mcsl_cumulative_performance_rate, cg.cg_name, cg.cs_num, cg.cg_max_mbr_count FROM monthly_challenge_score_list mcsl INNER JOIN challenge_group cg USING(cg_num) WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode}

/* 참여 멤버 점수 top3 */ SELECT cpsl.cpsl_num, cpsl.cg_num, cpsl.mbr_id, cpsl.cpsl_cumulative_performance_rate, m.mbr_file_idx, f.file_path FROM challenge_personal_score_list cpsl INNER JOIN member m USING (mbr_id) INNER JOIN files f ON m.mbr_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cpsl.cg_num = #{challengeCode} ORDER BY cpsl.cpsl_cumulative_performance_rate DESC LIMIT 3

/* 챌린지 멤버 리스트 조회(사이드바) */ SELECT MAX(cgm.cgm_num), MAX(cgm.cg_num), cgm.mbr_id, MAX(cgm.cs_num), MAX(cgm.cgm_date), f.file_idx, f.file_path FROM challenge_group_member cgm LEFT JOIN `member` m USING(mbr_id) INNER JOIN files f ON m.mbr_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode} GROUP BY cgm.mbr_id, f.file_path ORDER BY cgm.cgm_date ASC
mapper.insert: /* 챌린지 피드 댓글 등록 */ INSERT INTO challenge_feed_comments ( cfc_num, cmf_num, mbr_id, cfc_content, cfc_date, cfc_caution_check ) VALUES ( #{challengeFeedCommentCode}, #{challengeFeedCode}, #{challengeFeedCommentAuthor}, #{challengeFeedCommentContent}, NOW(), #{challengeFeedCommentCaution} )
mapper.select: /* 챌린지 진행 상태 조회 */ SELECT DISTINCT cg.cg_num, cg.cs_num, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date, cg.cg_max_mbr_count FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_member_score_stats cmss USING(cg_num) WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode}
/* 챌린지 상세 정보(오른쪽 사이드바) 챌린지 코드 */ SELECT cg.cg_num, cg.cg_start_date, cg.cg_end_date FROM challenge_group cg WHERE cg_num = #{challengeCode}
mapper.insert: /* 챌린지 피드 생성 */ INSERT INTO challenge_member_feed ( cmf_num, cg_num, mbr_id, cmf_content, cmf_date, cmf_like, cmf_warning_check, cmf_file_idx, cmf_food_intake, mc_num ) VALUES ( #{challengeFeedCode}, #{challengeCode}, #{challengeMemberId}, #{challengeFeedContent}, NOW(), #{challengeFeedLike}, #{challengeFeedWarningCheck}, #{challengeFeedFileIdx}, #{challengeFeedFoodIntake}, #{challengeMealCategory} )
mapper.select: /* 챌린지 피드 코드 */ SELECT cmf.cmf_num, cmf.cg_num, cmf.mbr_id, mf.file_path AS memberProfilePath, cmf.cmf_content, cmf.cmf_like, cmf.cmf_date, cmf.cmf_warning_check, cmf.cmf_file_idx, cf.file_path AS feedImagePath, cmf.cmf_food_intake, cmf.mc_num FROM challenge_member_feed cmf INNER JOIN member m ON cmf.mbr_id = m.mbr_id INNER JOIN files mf ON m.mbr_file_idx = mf.file_idx INNER JOIN files cf ON cmf.cmf_file_idx = cf.file_idx WHERE cmf.cmf_num = #{challengeFeedCode}

/* 댓글 리스트 조회 */ SELECT cmf.cg_num, cfc.cfc_num, cfc.mbr_id, cfc.cfc_content, cfc.cfc_date, m.mbr_file_idx, f.file_path AS mbr_profile_image FROM challenge_feed_comments cfc INNER JOIN challenge_member_feed cmf ON cmf.cmf_num = cfc.cmf_num INNER JOIN `member` m ON cfc.mbr_id = m.mbr_id LEFT JOIN files f ON m.mbr_file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE cfc.cmf_num = #{challengeFeedCode} ORDER BY cfc.cfc_date DESC
